stories.text:
Since the founding of the Sarcophagus Ambassador Community, alot has been accomplished. Sarcophagus has been mostly community driven. Here are SOME of the recent developments with the project.

Now listed on Metamask, CoinMarketCap, Coingecko, Zapper, Zerion, and 1Inch Holder count has doubled Regular Memes Contest with prize pot Under way! Massive Uni LP growth

Current(todays) $SARCO Earning Available Stablecoin Staking Payout: %11 APY LP Staking Payout: %271 APY

Coinlist Seed Program $3 Million Funding Round in Process Network Growth

Archeologist and Embalmer grants are still to planned.

Tons more info available at - sarcophagus.io

Ambassador Community Central - https://sarcophagus.community
